Articles.Content:
I have upgraded the Contract Office or whatever it is called to the fullest extent and so should be able to have unlimited contracts active, but if I have 14 active then I am not offered any more until I complete one. v1.02

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-09T12:10:17Z" title="06/09/2015 12:10  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 9, 2015</time> by THobson**

yeah, its not so unlimited.

and it seems like you have a specific number of 1, 2 and 3 star missions... if i declide a 1 star, another 1 star pop up.

I've noticed this as well, maximum number varies slightly for me (possibly based on rep?) but I've definitely never had more than 15. The debug menu can be used to spawn new *specific* contracts (I frequently use it to get the "Explore Minmus" one, which absolutely refuses to show up on its own) but unfortunately I don't believe there's a way to use it to just spawn a random contract. I suppose it's not a problem if you only ever do one mission at a time, but I'd love to see a mod/cheat/config edit/whatever that changes the way this works, or at least raises that upper limit to more like twenty or thirty for those of us who use KCT and KAC and like to multi-task.

As always, back up your files first.

Go to GameData\Squad\Contracts\Contracts.cfg, find AverageAvailableContracts value. This is what you want to change.
Thank you. I probably over did it by changing it from 10 to 20, but it feels more sensible now.
Don't worry. My current value is 25 and I once had 30 (just wanted to do something in parallel when those long interplanetary missions are still going).
